Package edu.ib.project.crazyeights.frontend

Class GUIController

java.lang.Object
edu.ib.project.crazyeights.frontend.GUIController
public class GUIController
extends java.lang.Object
The main controller class responsible for connecting the frontend to the backed of the application.

      Method responsible for generating a single bot
      Parameters:
      index - Index of a bot
      r - Index of a generated image
      catPhotos - Array of bot images
      cardBack - Image displayed on the back of a card

    • removeCard

      private void removeCard​(int index) throws java.lang.Exception
      Method responsible from removing a card after it's been played
      Parameters:
      index - Index of a card to be removed from player's hand
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Throws exception if index of a card is beyond player's cards scope

    • startGameButtonOnClick

      void startGameButtonOnClick()
      Method responsible for starting the game. Decides the number of cards per player. Assigns cards to each player. Displays game screen and generates players.

    • colorPickOnClick

      void colorPickOnClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.lang.Exception
      Method responsible for processing color chosen after playing an eight.
      Parameters:
      event - Click of a color button
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Throws and exception when the color is not recognized
